title: MD
biography: Kim Jong-min is a South Korean singer, dancer and television personality. He has been a member of the K-pop group Koyote since 2000 and a cast member of the variety show 2 Days & 1 Night since 2007.
aiSummary: Jong Min Park is a oncology specialist with an H-index of 101 at Seoul National University Hospital (Member). Has been published in Nature, Science, Energy & Environmental Science. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
